Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notification of the removal of parking spaces
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Notification of the removal of parking spaces.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of transportation to consult with the fire department prior to approving open street applications and certain bicycle lane projects and to require the fire department to confer with any affected firehouse prior to approving open street applications, bicycle lane projects, and major transportation projects
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the DOT to consult with the FDNY prior to approving open street applications, bicycle lane projects, and major transportation projects.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Approved by Committee
